mil3.7.16:1.2: “bhante nagasena, dukkaram nu kho bhagavata katan”ti?
mil3.7.16:1.5: “Kim pana, bhante nagasena, bhagavata dukkaram katan”ti.
mil3.7.16:1.6: “Dukkaram, maharaja, bhagavata katam imesam arupinam cittacetasikanam dhammanam ekarammane vattamananam vavatthanam akkhatam ‘ayam phasso, ayam vedana, ayam sanna, ayam cetana, idam cittan’”ti.
mil3.7.16:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, kocideva puriso navaya mahasamuddam ajjhogahetva hatthaputena udakam gahetva jivhaya sayitva janeyya nu kho, maharaja, so puriso ‘idam gangaya udakam, idam yamunaya udakam, idam aciravatiya udakam, idam sarabhuya udakam, idam mahiya udakan’”ti?
mil3.7.16:2.4: “Ito dukkarataram kho, maharaja, bhagavata katam imesam arupinam cittacetasikanam dhammanam ekarammane vattamananam vavatthanam akkhatam ‘ayam phasso, ayam vedana, ayam sanna, ayam cetana, idam cittan’”ti.
